name: Another Door
storyline:
On your journey, you'll battle not only enemies beyond your imagination, but also the decisions of your "allies". Together you are stronger, but only those who know how to betray will be rewarded. So be careful before you open another door...

Split screen, well-guarded intentions: play with up to 4 players on the same screen while keeping your choices secret, and only reveal your darkest plans at the very last moment.

Multiple choices: every encounter is a source of tragic decisions. You'll have to make the right choice at the right time. Will you be smarter than your companions in misfortune?

Forced friendships: Your relationships with others can save your skin, or on the contrary, lead to your downfall. Honesty is one option, lying is another. How many betrayals can you accept before ending your friendship?

Open another door: collect the reward and end your adventure here, safe in the knowledge that you'll get out alive, or continue, taking all the risks in the hope of obtaining more gems.

A nightmarish environment: the unhealthy horrors you encounter along the way have only one objective: to prevent you from reaching your goal.

Endless adventure: A randomly generated path, multiple choices and a group of unpredictable players under pressure? It's guaranteed that no two games will be the same.

After all, it's not as if you have a choice, is it? You're just insignificant pawns in a game that's bigger than you.
summary: Another Door is a semi-cooperative game that combines board game and roguelike elements, for an adventure between betrayal and forced friendship. Confront cursed creatures, hide your intentions and be the smartest if you want to save your soul...
